entry.title: Tell It to My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: LilOak

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,672Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 362

Summary: Stiles hadn’t wanted to get off the rink once he was in it but the Beacon Hills high school hockey team were rather impatient when it came time for their training slot. He was well and truly reacquainted with the ice, and not because he fell on his ass, twice, whilst attempting some of his more difficult moves. He didn’t feel ready to go home just yet. The idea of going home to an empty house and a microwave meal made his stomach twist and churn. He figured it wouldn’t hurt to hang around for the hockey gorillas to finish beating each other up so he could grab some extra time in the rink. If Stiles was being honest with himself maybe he enjoyed watching the boys get riled up and sweaty.Derek was so focused intently on getting to the exit as quick as possible that he didn’t notice at first that there was still someone on the ice…Or the figure skater/hockey player au no one asked for

entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,021Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 30

Summary: In this story, Stiles Stilinski suffers a terrible tragedy: His beloved Dad gets killed in front of him and he gets deported into sexual slavery to be sold as a "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14" to an obscure elite of "suitors".Derek Hale had a questionable upbringing, to say the least. Due to a cruel intrigue spun by a wealthy family, he had ended up in prison.After breaking free, he swears to take revenge. What he did not anticipate was rescuing a young man named Stiles Stilinski instead.How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will they help each other and find love and hope despite everything?

entry.title: Hale Confessions: The Stilinski Twin Easter Edition
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 742Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: On Easter evening, Peter Hale and Derek Hale share a rare, heartfelt moment as they watch their respective Stilinski mates—Isabelle and Stiles—laughing and playing in the garden. With whiskey in hand and the golden light of dusk casting long shadows, the Hale men reflect on love, fate, and the quiet chaos of being bound to someone as fiery and fiercely loyal as a Stilinski twin.Peter speaks openly about the years he spent chasing and loving Isabelle, admitting that even after a year of marriage, her presence still feels like a dream he’s afraid to wake from. Derek, newer to love but no less certain, confesses that Stiles is his home—messy, maddening, and absolutely irreplaceable.Their conversation is quiet but raw, touched by humor and honesty, as they acknowledge the protectiveness and passion that comes with loving a Stilinski. In the end, both men know they'd burn the world to protect what they have, bonded by the twin flames that stole their guarded hearts.

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,133Chapters: 9/12Kudos: 31

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now.Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house.He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

entry.title: Nothing's Holding Me Back Anymore
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,342Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Derek Hale had always been a man of few words, his stoic demeanor a shield against the world. But when Stiles Stilinski turned eighteen, something shifted in the air of Beacon Hills. The lanky, sarcastic teenager had grown into himself, his sharp wit now paired with a confidence that made Derek's wolf stir. It started subtly—lingering glances during pack meetings, Derek's eyes tracing the curve of Stiles' jaw, the way his long fingers gestured wildly when he rambled. Derek tried to ignore it, but the pull was undeniable.

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,628Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 49

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.title: Just A Bit Broken
entry.summary:
Author: stereksupremacy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,839Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Derek-The moment my eyes see Stiles I knew he was mine. Now it was just a matter of letting him see we were basically meant for each other. It shouldn't be too hard... Or will it? With too many obstacles between us, his brother included, is my love enough to win him over? They say love is hard, but how hard is too much? It doesn't matter. I will keep trying and trying even if it breaks me little by little. Stiles deserves love, and I will be the one to give it to him.Stiles-My life was turned upside down the day of my sixth-grade graduation. It's a subject we don't want to talk about. Ever. From there, things just got worse, so now. New town, new me. I won't let anyone close to me. Everyone in the end just hurts me and I don't think my heart, or my mental health can handle any more betrayals. So when Derek comes knocking on my cold, dead heart, I have to build higher and stronger walls. Because truth be told, I don't think I can keep saying no to him. But I have to. No matter how charming he is. Or how funny. Or how insanely hot he is. He'll just end up hurting me. Like him. The one who shall not be named. I'm not made for love. I learned that the hard way. Derek will have too as well.

entry.summary:
Author: Arvak

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,827Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 42

Summary: He'd seen it on the Nature Channel: Yellowstone National Park, one of the greatest marvels of nature, nestled right nearby in the good ol' Western States. And on a complete whim, he'd decided to pack the car and hit the road to get the hell away from customers and bosses and traffic and bills.He never expected to come face to face with a wolf. Or, rather, a werewolf who'd had very similar thoughts to his own, and who was much worse at social interaction.- OR -A total therapy fic about escape and freedom and achieving a better life that I hope you might enjoy as well.

entry.title: you were raised by wolves and voice (every night, i hear them howling)
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,364Chapters: 1/30Kudos: 35

Summary: Derek tips his head towards the heavens, dragging a rough palm over his face. “So I'm on babysitting duty. You're putting me on babysitting duty.” “I'm eighteen,” Stiles mumbles, scowling and petulant. Derek doesn't even look at him. “The training of an emissary is integral to the pack bond,” Deaton retorts. “To many, it is sacred, the connection between Alpha and emissary. You should treat it as an honour, Alpha Hale.” “Yeah, I feel real honoured,” Derek deadpans, sarcasm dripping from his dulcet tone. Deaton simply shakes his head with a sigh. ______ In which, post-3B, Derek doesn't get captured and instead travels. Finding himself faced with an Alpha Pack allied with a Witches' Coven on the hunt for the True Alpha, he returns to Beacon Hills to warn Scott of the threat. He's tasked with overseeing the new emissary's training, which just so happens to be Stiles. It's a test of patience for the both of them.

entry.title: The Fountain of Life III: Spellsinger
entry.summary:
Author: Mikethenut

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,278Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 1

Summary: It was a tempting offer. Let go of the knife, step away, and run off somewhere. But what about after? Would the nightmares return, would he suffer like before? If what Keo said was true, then this was something he had to face. Besides, his friends were still trapped inside....It was time for Stiles to awaken. Through thick and thin, with muck and grime – the only way out was through. Will he make it past all the bodies standing in his way? And more importantly – will his friends still recognize him on the other side?Note: This is the third entry in a four-part series. You can read each part on its own, but don't expect to understand everything right away. WARNING: The second chapter has explicit gore.
